bibl.title: In the Beginning: Bibles before the Year 1000.
bibl.note: Introduction to and catalogue of an exhibition held at the Arthur M. Sackler Gallery from October 2006 to January 2007. The exhibition marked the centenary of Charles Freer's visit to Egypt in 1906, where he purchased his first biblical manuscripts. Includes several fragments on papyrus.
bibl.seg: Michelle P. Brown (ed.), In the Beginning: Bibles before the Year 1000.
Washington, DC, Smithsonian Institution, 2006, 8Â°, vi-360 pp., ill. ISBN 978-1-588-34240-9. $45.

Introduction to and catalogue of an exhibition held at the Arthur M. Sackler Gallery from October 2006 to January 2007. The exhibition marked the centenary of Charles Freer's visit to Egypt in 1906, where he purchased his first biblical manuscripts. Includes several fragments on papyrus.
C.R. par Larry W. Hurtado, JECS 16 (2008) pp. 125-127.
